src_original: naṣṭaṃ kāpuruṣe sevā akṛtajñe ca yat kṛtam // iti

bhagavān āha:  kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ?  punar api yathaiṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.  The story of a lord of a bear and a poor man  (concerning a previous birth of Devadatta)  bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇāsyāṃ nagaryām anyatamo daridrapuruṣaḥ prativasati;

sa kāṣṭhāni vikrīya jīvikāṃ kalpayati:  so 'pareṇa samayena kālyam evotthāya paraśum ābhaṅgīm ādāya kāṣṭhārthī vanaṃ gataḥ;  mahāṃś cākālamegho jalamucamārutapūrvarūpaḥ samāgataḥ;  tataḥ sa puruṣaḥ yuktaṃ vāyuktaṃ vā idam iti sthānāntarasamanveṣaṇayā vṛkṣād vṛkṣāntaraṃ gacchati;  tathāpy ativṛṣyata eva;
tgt_original: 有人入山伐木，迷惑失道，時值暴雨，日暮飢寒，惡虫毒獸，欲來侵害。

src_original: sa vṛkṣāntaracāratayā anupūrveṇa parvataguhāṃ praviṣṭaḥ;  tasyāṃ ca guhāyām ṛkṣas tiṣṭhati;  sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā santrasto niṣpalāyitum ārabdhaḥ;
tgt_original: 是人入一石窟，窟中有一大熊，見之恐怖而出。

src_original: nāsti te matsakāśād bhayaṃ;  tiṣṭha iti;  saptāhasyātyayād aṣṭame divase vyabhre dine vigatabalāhake deve ṛkṣeṇa caturdiśaṃ vyavalokya prabhūtāni mūlaphalāni datvā sa puruṣaḥ abhihitaḥ:
ahaṃ coro mahārāja yo 'syādattaṃ jalaṃ pibet /  prayaccha me guruṃ daṇḍaṃ yaś corasya pradīyate //
nāsti pānīyasyādattādānam iti;  api tu kasya santakaṃ tvayā jalam apahṛtaṃ?  tena yathāvṛttaṃ samākhyātaṃ;
tgt_original: 『汝有何罪？ 』答言： 『我入王國，犯不與取，輒飲王水，用王楊枝！

src_original: sa tava bhrātā upādhyāyaś ca;  gaccha na tvaṃ daṇḍārhaḥ iti;
tgt_original: 『我以相與，何罪之有？ 我初登王位，皆以水及楊枝施於一切！ 』仙人言：

src_original: sa kathayati deva na śaknomy ahaṃ kaukṛtyaṃ (SBV II 44)  prayaccha me guruṃ daṇḍaṃ yaś corasya pradīyate iti;  evam ukte rājā prakupitaḥ tīvreṇa paryavasthānena paryavasthitaḥ;
tgt_original: 『王雖已施，我心疑悔，罪不除也！ 願今見治，無令後罪。
